link.label: Services Cookbook
link.text: Use MDW to quickly produce and consume services using SOAP, REST, JMS and many other protocols.

link.label: Cloud Foundry Cookbook
link.text: Deploy the MDW Buildpack to quickly and reliably get set up in a PaaS environment.

link.label: Apache Tomcat Cookbook
link.text: Walk through creation of an MDW workflow on Tomcat, including dynamic source code and web pages.

link.label: Camel Cookbook
link.text: Integrate Camel and MDW, with the ability to link together services through declarative route definitions. This also allows you to use many protocols supported by Camel.

link.label: JBoss Fuse Cookbook
link.text: Set up MDW to run in JBoss Fuse, and learn about some of the design patterns involved.

link.label: Apache ServiceMix Cookbook
link.text: Set up MDW to run in Apache ServiceMix, and learn about some of the design patterns involved.
